title: Main Commands
description:
Here's the list of stuff I can do! PM SpikeyRobot ({prefix}pmspikey) feature requests!
See [spikeybot.com](https://www.spikeybot.com/) for examples and more information.

rows.description: I will send you a link to add me to your server!
Send this message to you.
Make me say something.
I will tell you the date you created your account!
I will tell you the date you joined the server you sent the message from!
I will introduce myself to you!
I will send SpikeyRobot (my creator) your message because you are too shy!
Need a better look at your profile pic? I'll show you the original.
Want to know what my delay to the server is? I can tell you my ping!
Set a timer for a certain number of seconds. The bot will DM you the message at the end. No options lists timers.
Displays statistics about the bot and the servers it's on.
Play a game of Tic Tac Toe with someone! (Mention someone to challenge them)
Start a game of Connect 4 against someone! (Mention someone to challenge them)
I have an unlimited supply of coins! I will flip one for you!
Roll dice with any number of sides. Separate multiple numbers with spaces to roll multiple dice.
Play a song in your current voice channel, or add a song to the queue.
Join you in your voice channel.
Stop playing music and leave the voice channel.
Skip the currently playing song.
View the songs currently in the queue.
Remove a song with the given queue index from the queue.
Search for song lyrics.
Add positive or negative numbers separated by spaces.
Simplify an equation with numbers and variables.
Solve an equation for each variable in the equation.
Solve a math problem, and convert units.
Find dy/dx of an equation.
Graph an equation, Maxes and mins are all optional, but brackets are required.
Remove a number of messages from the current text channel. Mention people to only remove their messages.
I will ban the person you mention with a flashy message!
Silence the peasant who dare oppose you!
Turn on or off automatically preventing a person from using @everyone if they spam it.
